alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 12:06AM AKST until March 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blow snow and drifting snow with low visibility occurring. Travel will be difficult. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Over Elliot Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds gusting to 40 mph are causing blowing and drifting snow over Elliott Highway Summits. Wind are expected to decrease during the day on Friday.| PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
